about.details:
Arkade Developers Limited is a real estate development company focused on developing high-end, sophisticated lifestyle residential developments in Mumbai, Maharashtra.

The company's business can be divided into two segments:

  • Development/construction of residential buildings on land acquired by the company (new projects); and
  • Redevelopment of existing buildings (Redevelopment Projects)

The company is involved in the development of new projects and the redevelopment of existing buildings. Between 2017 and Q1 2024, the company launched 1,220 residential units and sold 1,045 residential units in various markets in MMR, Maharashtra. As of June 30, 2024, the company has developed 2.20 million square feet of residential properties. From CY 2003 to March 2024, the company has completed the redevelopment of 10 projects in the western suburbs of Mumbai and 1 project in south-central Mumbai (through a partnership firm in which the company held a majority stake) with a total built-up area of 1,000,000 square feet (approx.).

In the last two decades, the Company has completed 28 projects including 11 projects on a standalone basis including 2 projects executed through partnership firms in which the Company held a majority stake, 8 projects executed by the promoter through his proprietorship, M/s Arkade Creations, and 9 projects through joint development agreements with other third parties with a total built-up area of more than 4.5 million square meters awarded to more than 4,000 customers.

As of June 30, 2024, the company had 201 permanent employees and an additional 850 employees on a contract basis as of June 30, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the Arkade Developers IPO?
faqs.answer:
Arkade Developers IPO is a main-board IPO of 32031250 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹410.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹128 per share. The minimum order quantity is 110.

The IPO opens on September 16, 2024, and closes on September 19, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Arkade Developers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Arkade Developers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Arkade Developers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Arkade Developers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Arkade Developers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Arkade Developers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Arkade Developers IPO opens on September 16, 2024 and closes on September 19, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Arkade Developers IPO?
faqs.answer: Arkade Developers IPO lot size is 110, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,080.

faqs.question: How to apply for Arkade Developers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Arkade Developers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Arkade Developers IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Arkade Developers IPO will be done on Friday, September 20, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, September 23, 2024. Check the Arkade Developers IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Arkade Developers IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Arkade Developers IPO listing date is on Tuesday, September 24, 2024.
